author: Blender Guru
description:
Let's glaze that donut 🍩
New parts releasing every other day 🔜

In this video you'll learn how to model and sculpt dripping icing over the donut using Blender 5.0.

All Links🔗: https://www.blenderguru.com/tutorials/blender-donut-v5-tutorial

=== Chapter Marks :scissors:===
0:00 Introduction 
0:23 Outliner Organization 
1:10 Renaming 
1:49 Making Icing
3:16 Duplicate Object 
4:12 Remove bottom half of donut 
5:46 Unstuck Yourself Guide
7:35 Solidify Modifier on Icing 
8:36 Proportional Editing Tool 
13:00 Adding dribble parts 
13:56 Subdivision Surface Modifier 
14:26 Shrinkwrap Modifier
15:28 Fixing z fighting (Sorting modifiers) 
21:39 Fixing icing position - Edge Data
25:52 Apply Modifiers
27:14 Sculpting 
28:50 Inflate/Deflate Brush 
30:24 Homework - Plate

title: Blender Donut 5.0 - Part 3 (Icing)
